title: Identify Key Opinion Leaders (KOLs)
description: An agent must identify key opinion leaders in a specific medical field by analyzing publication databases.

tasks.description: Search PubMed and other medical publication databases for authors who have published frequently on a specific topic (e.g., 'CAR-T cell therapy').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent executes targeted searches and retrieves a list of authors.

tasks.description: Rank the authors by number of publications and citation count to identify the top 5 KOLs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a correctly ranked list of the most influential experts.

tasks.description: Create a profile for each KOL, including their current institution and most cited work.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles a concise profile for each identified expert.
